00026 // XD Deactivate_SIGINT_Catch interprete Deactivate_SIGINT_Catch -1 Flag to disable the detection of the signal SIGINT.
00027 
00028 Sortie& Deactivate_SIGINT_Catch::printOn(Sortie& os) const { return Interprete::printOn(os); }

00032 //
00033 //
00034 //! Main function of the Deactivate_SIGINT_Catch interpreter<br>Set the Deactivate_SIGINT_Catch variable to 1.
00035 Entree& Deactivate_SIGINT_Catch::interpreter(Entree& is)
00036 {
00037   DEACTIVATE_SIGINT_CATCH = 1;
00038   return is;
00039 }
